about_the_game:
In a universe full of opportunity and fortune as a Spacer two things are true: Space is really dangerous and big and two always remember to get paid. Pay your debts and stay safe!

You are a former cadet of the Spacer Ranger Academy and now to pay off the debt incurred through education you pay it off in a workplace relief program called the Spacer Rescue. The Hazrdia Company has hired a rescue agency to find and protect The Cuddliest of the Universe. The Cutest, are interdimensional beings trapped in the form of immortal space bunnies. Representations of the great space elements: Magnesium, Quark, Sound, Neon, and Plasma. First, you will have to collect the Hazrdian Representative from their current position at the prison (part of a work release program). The prison may and probably does not know you are coming.

- “The Cutest” artifacts can cause devastating effects on objects, environments, and beings.
- Fast, hectic twin-stick action missions with explosives and special weapons and crew abilities.
- Colorful interactions with space gods and Robot Scavengers as they try to stop you from completing this rescue on behalf of a cadre of evil cyborg ex-spacers.
- Wild Crew of Characters aboard the Midgard act as Assists for combat options.

In a universe full of opportunity and fortune as a Spacer two things are true: Space is really dangerous and big and two always remember to get paid. Pay your debts and stay safe!

You are a former cadet of the Spacer Ranger Academy and now to pay off the debt incurred through education you pay it off in a workplace relief program called the Spacer Rescue. The Hazrdia Company has hired a rescue agency to find and protect The Cuddliest of the Universe. The Cutest, are interdimensional beings trapped in the form of immortal space bunnies. Representations of the great space elements: Magnesium, Quark, Sound, Neon, and Plasma. First, you will have to collect the Hazrdian Representative from their current position at the prison (part of a work release program). The prison may and probably does not know you are coming.

- “The Cutest” artifacts can cause devastating effects on objects, environments, and beings.
- Fast, hectic twin-stick action missions with explosives and special weapons and crew abilities.
- Colorful interactions with space gods and Robot Scavengers as they try to stop you from completing this rescue on behalf of a cadre of evil cyborg ex-spacers.

legal_notice: All Rights are reserved for the title: Spacer Rescue: To Vahalla and all Spacer Rescue content by Colossal Robot Studios and operator Nick Hazrd.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina (10.15.7 or later)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or higher
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur (11.5.1 or later)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or higher

name: Spacer Rescue: To Valhalla

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or higher
